C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

initContainers.name: check-postgres-db

command:
mkdir -p /bitnami/postgresql/conf /bitnami/postgresql/data /bitnami/postgresql/lock
chmod 700 /bitnami/postgresql/conf /bitnami/postgresql/data /bitnami/postgresql/lock
chown 1001:1001 /bitnami/postgresql
find /bitnami/postgresql -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -not -name ".snapshot" -not -name "lost+found" | \
  xargs -r chown -R 1001:1001
initContainers.name: init-chmod-data
check-postgres-db
check-postgres-db

containers.name: create-namespace
args: curl -fSs -X GET "$PULSAR_ADMINURL/admin/v2/tenants/$PULSAR_TENANT" || curl -fSs -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"allowedClusters": ["pulsar"]}' "$PULSAR_ADMINURL/admin/v2/tenants/$PULSAR_TENANT"; curl -fSs -X GET "$PULSAR_ADMINURL/admin/v2/namespaces/$PULSAR_TENANT/$PULSAR_NAMESPACE" || curl -fSs -X PUT "$PULSAR_ADMINURL/admin/v2/namespaces/$PULSAR_TENANT/$PULSAR_NAMESPACE";

controls.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
